title: Can't open the actual game.
body: I haven't played League in months, so I figured it was nigh time to get back into playing this game. New year, and all that shit. However, when I try to play the game, it doesn't open. I can open the client and everything fine, but when I actually press Launch, it disappears like it does usually, and I find myself starring at my computer screen for ten minutes before I realize something is amiss. Dunno what's actually going on, whether it's my own fault or if it's an issue with the client, but it's slightly annoying.

replies.body: You might be having a connection problem that can't reach pvp.net, or load up recent updates.  You should run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions.
I've found another issue. The Champion rotation on my client is the one from last week, whereas the new rotation is up on the website and clearly different. No matter what, I can't get into the game.
